description: "Guntarl" is a corruption of the German name "Gunther,". He answers to the Elders of the Heavens, and is in command of the united armies. He is a cunning and dangerous person who hungers for power. He is the one who directs the attacks against http://anidb.net/ch3718 [Munto]`s Magical Kingdom in an attempt to seize control.
name: Guntarl
